resources.string:
"Sample Icon Pack.

This icon pack intends to make your device's launcher more intuitive and beautiful by applying custom icons. It is free and will always be. If you want to thank me and support my work, go to the XDA link and Thank me there :). 

Email: jamal.areeb@gmail.com"

"This is a banner pack for Android TV. Using the app Tv App Repo, one can create shortcuts to apps with custom icons or banners. This is an open source set of banners to help icon pack artists get started with TVs."
